perturbation.original_text: 2.1 Grant of Rights to Distributor. Subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement, Zogenix hereby appoints Distributor, and Distributor accepts appointment, as the exclusive distributor (even as to Zogenix) of the Product in the Field in the Territory during the Term, and grants to Distributor the exclusive rights to maintain Regulatory Approval of (while Distributor is the MAH Party), package, promote, market, offer for sale, sell, import and distribute the Product in the Field in the Territory during the Term.
perturbation.changed_text: 2.1 Grant of Rights to Distributor. Subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement, Zogenix hereby appoints Distributor, and Distributor accepts appointment, as the exclusive supplier (even as to Zogenix) of the Product in the Field in the Territory during the Term, and grants to Distributor the exclusive rights to maintain Regulatory Approval of (while Distributor is the MAH Party), package, promote, market, offer for sale, sell, import and distribute the Product in the Field in the Territory during the Term.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'distributor' to 'supplier' introduces confusion about the role of Nippon Shinyaku. A distributor markets and sells, while a supplier provides products. This creates ambiguity regarding Nippon Shinyaku's core responsibilities, making it unclear if they primarily sell or just supply the product to others who sell.

perturbation.original_text:
5.1 Commercialization of the Product.
(a) Distributor Responsibilities. Distributor shall have the exclusive right to market, promote, sell, offer for sale,
import, package and otherwise Commercialize the Product in the Field in the Territory, at its sole cost and expense, in accordance
with Applicable Laws and the Commercialization Plan and subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text:
5.1 Commercialization of the Product.
(a) Distributor Responsibilities. The exclusive vendor shall have the exclusive right to market, promote, sell, offer for sale,
import, package and otherwise Commercialize the Product in the Field in the Territory, at its sole cost and expense, in accordance
with Applicable Laws and the Commercialization Plan and subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: Replacing “Distributor” with "the exclusive vendor" creates uncertainty. The contract consistently refers to “Distributor” (defined as Nippon Shinyaku Company, Ltd.), but using “exclusive vendor” without defining it introduces ambiguity. This makes enforcement difficult as it’s unclear if 'the exclusive vendor' refers to the same entity, potentially affecting liability and obligations.

perturbation.original_text:
5.2 Supply. The Parties acknowledge and agree that Zogenix shall retain all rights to make and have made the Product in
and for the Territory. Promptly after the Effective Date, the Parties shall commence negotiating a supply agreement containing
reasonable and customary terms for an agreement of such type, governing Zogenix’s supply of the Product to Distributor for sale in
the Field in the Territory in accordance with the terms of this Agreement (as may be amended, the “Supply Agreement”), and
shall use reasonable efforts to enter into the Supply Agreement within [***] after the Effective Date.
perturbation.changed_text:
5.2 Supply. The Parties acknowledge and agree that Zogenix shall retain all rights to make and have made the Product in
and for the Territory. Promptly after the Effective Date, the Parties shall commence negotiating a supply agreement containing
reasonable and customary terms for an agreement of such type, governing Zogenix’s supply of the Product to the exclusive marketer for sale in
the Field in the Territory in accordance with the terms of this Agreement (as may be amended, the “Supply Agreement”), and
shall use reasonable efforts to enter into the Supply Agreement within [***] after the Effective Date.
perturbation.explanation: Changing “Distributor” to “the exclusive marketer” is inconsistent. The contract clearly defines “Distributor” but doesn’t define "the exclusive marketer". This leads to potential disputes over who is responsible for specific supply related obligation based on the agreement.
